scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd packages/shop-frontend && npm run build && cd build && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:thanharmstrong86/shop-frontend.git && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy shop-frontend' && git branch -M main && git push -f origin main
scripts.deploy:admin: cd packages/admin-panel && npm run build && cd build && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:thanharmstrong86/admin-panel.git && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy admin-panel' && git branch -M main && git push -f origin main
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:admin
